features: NOURISHING MOISTURIZER - Enriched with Apple and Aloe extracts, this shampoo provides antioxidant protection for enhanced moisture and even softer hair
COLOR SAFE SCALP CARE - Gently cleansing your hair for manageable smoothness, this shampoo works at the scalp and throughout in order to calm unruly hair while alleviating frizz and preserving color
DAMAGE RELIEF - This smoothing shampoo is specifically formulated to hydrate and detangle dry and damaged hair, protecting it against breakage and split ends. It’s recommended for all types of hair
VEGAN FRIENDLY - GIOVANNI products use organic ingredients and are Leaping Bunny Certified. GIOVANNI products are cruelty-free and come in sophisticated recyclable packaging
ECO CHIC - GIOVANNI has been bridging the gap between natural and salon-quality hair care since 1979. We strive to use the very best ingredients and are always focused on high performance
body.description: GIOVANNI Eco Chic Smooth As Silk Deep Moisture Shampoo has a pearlized formula that glistens in your hand and transforms your hair into a silky palette. Enriched with Apple and Aloe extracts, this shampoo provides antioxidant protection for enhanced moisture and even silkier hair. GIOVANNI was the first full-range, salon-inspired hair-care brand in natural product stores, and today is the #1 selling Hair Care line in the United States Natural Products Industry. But before there was a brand, there was a pioneer. Arthur Guidotti had a vision and a love for all things hair. He began developing his passion as a hairstylist in Hollywood and Beverly Hills. By the 1960s, Arthur was maturing his talents and decided to open his own salon, called On Sunset. The salon was a bustling site, on the famous Sunset Strip, and a hit with many Hollywood celebrities, including Lucille Ball. Since 1979 the GIOVANNI Rule of Balance has been our commitment to make each product as pure and as natural as possible without sacrificing exceptional product performance. GIOVANNI is committed to creating only the highest-performance formulations, wrapped in aesthetically beautiful packaging and marketed with extraordinary visuals and graphics.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Eco Chic Hair Care Invigorating Hair Care Eco Chic helps repair dry, damaged, and color-treated hair. The invigorating ingredients rejuvenate your hair whether you're cleansing, conditioning, hydrating, or holding. Botanical Extracts Looking to rejuvenate, strengthen, and gorgeously restore your hair? Eco Chic formulas are bursting with nutrients and organic-oil blends. Luxurious Appearance Apple and Aloe extracts provide antioxidant protection and enhanced moisturizers for even silkier hair. Eco Chic is for hair that looks and feels flawless. Cruelty-Free Eco Chic products are Lauryl and Laureth Sulfate-free. We don’t add harsh chemicals, or artificial dyes, and never test on animals!

Filled With Botanical Ingredients List of Botanical Extract: Pyrus Malus (Apple) Fruit Extract, *Aloe Barbadensis (Aloe Vera) Leaf Juice, *Citrus Grandis (Grapefruit) Fruit Extract, *Cymbopogon Schoenanthus (Lemongrass) Extract,*Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Extract, *Macrocystis Pyrifera (Sea Kelp) Extract, *Mangifera Indica (Mango) Extract *USDA Certified Organic Ingredient. (Awarded in 2020) For a complete list of ingredients please reference the ingredients label on the back of the product. Sulfate-Free Vegan Friendly Color-Safe Eco Chic Smooth as Silk Deep Moisture Shampoo Soft and smooth, sexy and sultry. Smooth As Silk Deep Moisture Shampoo has a pearlized formula that glistens in your hand and transforms your hair into a silky palette. New and improved formulation with Apple and Aloe extracts provide antioxidant protection and enhanced moisturizers for even silkier hair. Lather and glow with the flow that begins your style. Smooth As Silk Deep Moisture Shampoo wears beautifully on you. Cleanses gently for manageable smoothness Alleviates frizz Increases shine while smoothing dry or damaged hair The pearl toned formula glistens in your hand Soothes dry, chemically processed hair

Giovanni...Bridging the Gap Between Natural & Salon Quality OUR INGREDIENTS Our products are formulated using a number of organic ingredients, we are Leaping Bunny Certified and the vast majority of our products are vegan friendly. OUR COMMUNITY Giovanni enjoys partnering with Eco Chic women (& men) who use their everyday gifts to do something beautiful in our world and local communities. OUR STORY Giovanni was the first full-range, salon-inspired hair-care brand in natural products stores, and today continues to Bridge the Gap between Natural and Salon-Quality hair care. OUR COMMITMENT Since 1979 the Giovanni Rule of Balance has been our commitment to make each product as pure and as natural as possible without sacrificing exceptional product performance.

Eco Chic Tea Tree Triple Treat Invigorating Shampoo Eco Chic L.A. Hold Styling Gel Eco Chic Direct Leave-In Conditioner Eco Chic Frizz Be Gone Serum Eco Chic Smooth As Silk Shampoo Eco Chic L.A. reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Dreamy aroma (from a sensitive sniffer)
reviews.reviewText: This is a nice creamy, yet highly lathering shampoo. It is very moisturizing. Some of our curly hairs like it, but one of us doesn't need this much moisture (it's very moisturizing). The smell is divine, even when I have a migraine, which says a lot. I can tell it's quality, non-toxic fragrance. I will buy again happily.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: my hair was feeling like dry hay. I had terrible frizz and didn’t know what to do. After extensive research I learned what I was missing and this shampoo and conditioner combo was one of the top rated within my price range. After the first 2 washes I was shocked at how different my hair felt. Brushing in the shower was much easier, less breakage, and super soft. Smells great, doesn’t feel heavy, and works quick.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I absolutely love Giovanni products. I have been using this one in particular for years. They seemed to have gotten more popular over time thus the slight price increase. Well worth it. Leaves my hair feeling clean, soft and moisturized.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Overall Good Shampoo-With One Drawback.
reviews.reviewText: This shampoo is very moisturizing in my experience. It's a bit spendy, but buying the large size helps with that. The one drawback with the formulation is that it doesn't lather as well as commercial shampoos. But this may be a fair tradeoff for being Lauryl & Laureth Sulfate free.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 4, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Liked how it made my hair feel and reduced the frizziness.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Solution to fine hair
reviews.reviewText: Gives my fine hair some body

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 23, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I really wanted to like this shampoo. I like the smell and felt like it really got my hair clean. However, I’m now getting dandruff, which I have never had. Hate that I bought such a big bottle that will now go to waste

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The best non chemical shampoo brand
reviews.reviewText: I love Giovanni hair products as they have no noxious chemicals in them. This large size pump dispenser works out quite a bit cheaper than buying the 8.5 oz bottles. I like the soft as silk shampoo and conditioner when my hair is drier as it is quite moisturizing.
